body.p: The indexing process is automatically triggered when a change is detected in the WebHelp Responsive output.

The indexing process can be manually triggered using the Reindex button available in the Content Indexing and Search section from the Version Settings page. The Status must be displayed as Ready before the functionality is available in the output. You can click the Check Index Status button to the right of the status to query the OTSS server for the current status.
